DataElement.preferredName: Prior Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Timepoint Therapeutic Procedure Administration Yes No Character Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: This indicator that describes whether or not a therapeutic procedure was administered prior to the hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Timepoint Therapeutic Procedure Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Prior Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Timepoint Therapeutic Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was a treatment administered
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was a treatment administered prior to this hematopoietic stem cell transplantation?
